text: Notoacmea elongata is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lottiidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Powell A. W. B., New Zealand Mollusca, William Collins Publishers Ltd, Auckland, New Zealand 1979 ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods of New Zealand Category:Gastropods described in 1834
title: Notoacmea elongata
